response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, we propose to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. We are confident that this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties to benefit. Should you require any additional information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 750000}
